page_content: Discusses electronic business transactions (eGVT) for banks, including technical and procedural aspects.
Discusses a study on the financial situation of the Canton of Aargau, highlighting its strong performance in various financial metrics.
Provides information on various services and programs to assist young people in finding apprenticeships.
Provides information on how to register for interim solutions after compulsory schooling, including the use of the "Wegweiser" online platform for the application process.
Provides information on AGOBIS, a land and object information system, including login procedures and user guides.
Discusses traffic regulations, safety measures, and law enforcement activities related to road traffic in the Canton of Aargau.
Discusses various programs and services to assist young people in transitioning from primary to secondary education, focusing on vocational training.
Discusses the "emedko" electronic application used for periodic medical checks related to driving fitness, including its features and benefits.
Discusses a brochure that provides a guide to the visible traces from Roman times, including descriptions of individual monuments and historical events.
Discusses the financial goals and principles set by the government for the Canton of Aargau, focusing on sustainability and economic growth.
